title: [ISSUE] Xamarin Forms - Reference to "libSkiaSharp.framework" in the iOS project with yellow exclamation mark
body:
**Description**

I have a Xamarin Forms project (iOS and Android) where I use the "SkiaSharp.Views.Forms" library (ver. 2.80.3 and before 2.80.2).
In the iOS project I get the following reference added, every time I open the project.
"C:\Users\username\\.nuget\packages\skiasharp\2.80.3\buildTransitive\xamarinios1.0\..\..\build\xamarinios1.0\libSkiaSharp.framework"

To compile and run the App, this reference needs to be removed.

**Expected Behavior**

No exclamation mark in the reference or no reference at all to:

"C:\Users\username\\.nuget\packages\skiasharp\2.80.3\buildTransitive\xamarinios1.0\..\..\build\xamarinios1.0\libSkiaSharp.framework"

**Actual Behavior**

The following reference is present every time the project is opened and needs to be removed manually to comple and run:

"C:\Users\username\\.nuget\packages\skiasharp\2.80.3\buildTransitive\xamarinios1.0\..\..\build\xamarinios1.0\libSkiaSharp.framework"



**Screenshots**
![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52780377/125769621-dc96b42c-82be-46f1-a60e-f9b60bacdb7f.png)

Is there a solution to this problem?
Thanks.
